snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include Paul Allen opening an office in Silicon Valley to expand his investments there, a look back at the MySpace...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include Paul Allen opening an office in Silicon Valley to expand his investments there, a look back at the MySpace phone and a full set of emojis drawn by a cartoonist.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Digg Resurgence, and Nanoparticles vs. Viruses
